1908 
April 15 Received from Mr. Wu Ting Fang, Cash, $ 650.00 
April 3 W. H. Higgins, 1/4 carriage hire to depot, 
April 16 Macullar Parker & Co., 2 suits clothes, 
April 16 C. S. Ingham, Dummer Academy,

Linen and incidental, 
April 16 J. M. Stewart, room de board, Phillips Inn,

(Maroh 8 & 9) 
April 20 S. S. Kwan, Cash, incidental,

2 Cash to S. S. Kwan for Boston trip,

R. C. Hurd, medical services, 
May 11 C. S. Inghan, May allowance, 
May 12 E. B. George, Treas. Bal. suction,

Dummer Academy, 
May 14 W. J. Burns, shirts and underwear, 
June 9 Chas, S. Ingham, June allowance, 
June 16 S. S. Kwan, Cash, Washington trip, 
June 20 C. S. Ingham, incidental, (H.O.Winch) 
June 20 E. B. George, Treas., Incidentals as per bill, 
June 24, Chas. S. Ingham, tennis jacket, etc.

(Wright & Ditson) 
July 7 S. $. Kwan, Summer expenses, 
Aug. 5 C. S. Ingham, Board & suction to July 31, 
Aug. 5 P. J. Hannon, Suit of Clothes & garters, 
Sept. 3 Chas. S. Ingham, Summer board * suction,

Aug. 1 to 18, 
Sept.19 Cash to boy-room key deposit, 
Sept.19 Trustees of Phillips Academy, Meal ticket

& seven weeks board at $3. -
Sept.22 Rec'd from C. S. Ingham, Agent, 
Balance on account,

2.75 
Oot. 3 Coes & Stodder, Shoes, etc. 
Oct. S. S. Kwan, Oct. allowance, 
Oct. 5 John Stewart, cleaning & pressing clothes,

fall term, 
Oct. 12 Clyde Martin, Asst. Mge., Foot-ball sobs. 
Oct. 14 Cash to A. E. Stearns, loan on telephone

charges, Mar. 5, 10, Apr. 4,.16, 
Nov. 3 S. $. Kwan, November allowance, 
Nov. 20 Phillips Academy Athletic Asso.,

Hockey Team subscription, 
Dec. 5 S. S. Kwan, December allowance, 
Dec. 5 Received from Dr. Kwan, cash,

500.00 
Dec Macullar Parker & Co. suit of clothes, 
Dec. 7 Trustees of Phillips Academy, Board & meal

tickets, Nov.5 to Dec. 16, 
Dec. 11 A. V. Bell, Watch-for, 
Dec. 11 Andover Press, Books & stationary, 
Dec. 11 Buxton & Coleran, Shade glass cone, 
Dec. 12 Trustees of Phillips Academy, 1st payment

suction $80., deposit, $10, room $75., 
Dec. 14 Students' Hand Laundry, (fall term), 
Dec. 14 P. J. Hannon, cap & garters, 
Dec. 15 S. S. Kwan, Vacation expenses, 
Dec. 16 M. J. Hayes, 3 School Calendars,

Jan. 6 Herbert 1. Chaae, Athletic goods &

camera supplies, 
Jan. 23 S. S. Kwan, January allowance, 
Yrb. 9 Coes & Young, Shoes, bill of Dec. 24, 
Feb. 20 S. S. Kwan, 1/2 Feb. allowance, 
Feb. 19 Trustees of Phillips Academy, board,

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Statement of account from April 15, 1908 to March 15, 1909.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
